description: To address the remote code execution vulnerability in Windows, systems must be updated using the following update packages: KB5032199, KB5032192, KB5032190, and KB5032189. These updates apply to various Windows versions, including Windows 10 and Windows 11. Make sure to review compatibility with your current builds: 10.0.22631.2715, 10.0.19045.3693, and others listed in the CVE details. The updates can be accessed and installed from the official Microsoft Update Catalog using the provided links: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032199, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032189, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032190.
